gw.api.system.cluster

Class ClusterStateProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.system.cluster.ClusterStateProvider

  • public abstract class ClusterStateProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides access to the cluster state.

      • getComponents

                                                            java.util.Date earliestStopDate)
        Returns a list of components including their history
        Parameters:
        types - a set of component types to return.
        earliestStopDate - The earliest component stop which must be included in the result.
        Returns:
        a list of components.

      • getClusterState

        public abstract ClusterState getClusterState()
        Returns the cluster state.
        Returns:

      • nodeFailed

        public abstract void nodeFailed(java.lang.String serverId,
                                boolean evenIfInCluster)
        Cleans and releases resources (batch processes, plugins, message destinations etc) holding by a specified node. This method might have a dangerous impact if the node is still running.
        Parameters:
        serverId - Server Id.
        evenIfInCluster - Consider node as failed even if it is still in the cluster.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the node is in the cluster and the evenIfInCluster parameter is false.

      • completeFailedFailover

        Completes failed failover
        Parameters:
        componentType - component type
        componentId - component id

                                              java.lang.String targetOwner)
        Requests component transfer
        Parameters:
        componentType - component type
        componentId - component id
        targetOwner - target owner
